meanings.definition: Designed to prevent or prohibit kickbacks.
meanings.sent1: The company implemented an antikickback policy to stop any unfair deals.
meanings.sent2: The new antikickback system in place helped maintain fairness in business transactions.
meanings.sent3: The antikickback rule made sure everyone played by the same rules.
meanings.sent4: Her antikickback attitude towards corruption earned her respect in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sign served as a clear antikickback warning to all employees.

meanings.definition: A law or regulation that prohibits kickbacks.
meanings.sent1: The antikickback was passed to ensure honesty in business dealings.
meanings.sent2: Violating the antikickback could result in severe penalties.
meanings.sent3: The courtroom was abuzz with discussions about the new antikickback.
meanings.sent4: The antikickback stood as a shield against corrupt practices.
meanings.sent5: The government's antikickback was a step towards transparency in the industry.
